Option Name: Detailed Example: 1.5ft, Back/Left/Right Windows, 2ft Offset, 4ft Window Height
Detailed Example: 2.5ft, Front Windows, 1ft Offset, 5ft Window Height
Front Depth: The depth of overhangs for windows for the front facade.
Back Depth: The depth of overhangs for windows for the back facade.
Left Depth: The depth of overhangs for windows for the left facade.
Right Depth: The depth of overhangs for windows for the right facade.
Distance to Top of Window: Average distance between the overhangs and the top of the windows.
Distance to Bottom of Window: Average distance between the overhangs and the bottom of the windows.
